name: Duck Game Hat
summary: A HAT file is an image meant to be used as a hat in Duck Game, a multiplayer 2D duck battle game. It contains a 64 x 32 pixel .PNG image that, when selected in Duck Game, appears atop a duck's head. Duck Game players often create and share custom HAT files online.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

windows.display_name: Gears for Breakfast A Hat in Time

macos.display_name: Gears for Breakfast A Hat in Time

android.display_name: Art of Tunnel HA Tunnel Plus
